abstract: In their final conversation previewing the seasons of the local N.H.L. teams, Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta ponder whether the Devils are ready to return to dominance.
snippet: In their final conversation previewing the seasons of the local N.H.L. teams, Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta ponder whether the Devils are ready to return to dominance.
lead_paragraph: In their final conversation previewing the 2011-12 seasons of the local N.H.L. teams, Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta ponder whether the Devils are ready to return to regular-season dominance.

headline.main: 2-on-1: With Healthy Parise and New Coach, Are the Devils the Devils Again?
